chat_history.message: Hello, My product iPhone 13 Pro Max has the above problem: Hi, I booked extra express shipping so that my phone arrives today. My iPhone still hasn't arrived. Please reverse the express shipping charge again. Thank you very much for your help,

Hello!

The tracking status of this order has not changed in 4 business days and is now considered lost as per Back Market delivery policy. We have requested the Back Market certificate of non-receipt and picture of the customers ID to arrange a refund or a replacement.

Once all the paperwork has been gathered we’ll let you know if the customer prefers a refund or a reshipment. The deadline is 24 hours from reception of the documents

If at any point the delivery begins to move again a refund will not be issued and the order is considered to be late.

Best regards,
Fabio - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

The customer has already sent us the necessary documents, please open an investigation and reimburse the customer within the next 24 hours.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately the CND is not valid as the CND is not handwritten. Please ask the customer to print out the CND and write out the details. Thank you.

Regards,
RK

Hello ecomobile,

the customer has already sent the document.

Please refund the customer within the next 24 hours.

Thank you for understanding,
Fabio from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing us with the relevant documents. We will continue our investigation with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We are waiting for reply from our logistic partner. Please DO NOT proceed with the refund.
Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Dear Backcare, 

The refund has been made. 

Regards, 
RK
